nodes.text: Coral was a YT-1300 light freighter used Grand Admiral Zaarin, it was part of an attempt to loot ZA-13. It was carrying TIE Avenger parts. However it was disabled by Tan Maarek Stele, then boarded by Imperial boarding parties to recover the cargo, before being destroyed.
The ship was called Z-Coral to remind the player it belonged to Zaarin.
